meanings.definition: The act of being an expert in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: Her experting in coding made her the go-to person for tech help.
meanings.sent2: His experting in cooking led to him opening his own restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The experting of the cat in finding hidden treats amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: His experting in fixing things was like having a magic touch.
meanings.sent5: The experting of the detective in solving mysteries was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The process of gaining expertise or knowledge in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The experting of the students in math was evident from their high grades.
meanings.sent2: Her experting in painting started with simple brush strokes.
meanings.sent3: The experting of the robot in learning new tasks was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His experting in gardening bloomed like a flower in spring.
meanings.sent5: The experting of the scientist in discovering new planets was groundbreaking.
